thread.title: Stefan Polenda of TTTech talks about Altera SoCs
thread.title_full: Stefan Polenda of TTTech talks about Altera SoCs

title: Stefan Polenda of TTTech talks about Altera SoCs
text:
Home > Videos > Stefan Polenda of TTTech talks about Altera SoCs Stefan Polenda of TTTech talks about Altera SoCs TTTech is working with Audi and Altera to provide a complete autonomous driving system for the 2017 Audi A7 sedan. Dr. Polenta, member of the companies Executive Board, tells us how it will be done. 
Altera SoCs, using Cortex A9 cores and advanced graphics capabilities, help Vienna, Austria TTTech meet tough automotive autonomous driving system requirements. Add Comment Text Only 2000 character limit Please login to comment on the article Websites:
